GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles and a comment_count of all articles
queries: sort_by[title or topic or author or created_at or votes]

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of specified article based on article_id and a comment_count of this article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with new updated vote count

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comment objects of specified article base on article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the specified article and serves an object with the new created comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment based on comment id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of the users as objects.
